user.title: Setup a new Apple TV

reconfigure.title: Device Reconfiguration
reconfigure.description: This Apple TV is experiencing some connection difficulties and must be reconfigured.

pair_with_pin.title: Pair With Device
pair_with_pin.description: Pairing is required for the `{protocol}` protocol. Please enter the PIN code displayed on screen. Leading zeros shall be omitted, i.e. enter 123 if the displayed code is 0123.

pair_no_pin.title: Pair With Device
pair_no_pin.description: Pairing is required for the `{protocol}` service. Please enter PIN {pin} on your Apple TV to continue.

service_problem.title: Failed to Add Service
service_problem.description: A problem occurred while pairing protocol `{protocol}`. It will be ignored.

confirm.title: Confirm Adding Apple TV
confirm.description:
You are about to add the Apple TV named `{name}` to Home Assistant.

**To complete the process, you may have to enter multiple PIN codes.**

Please note that you will *not* be able to power off your Apple TV with this integration. Only the media player in Home Assistant will turn off!

zeroconf.lookup_id_failed: Failed to look up device id for device.

error.device_not_found: Device could not be found on network, please try again.
error.device_already_configured: This device has already been configured. Please pick another device.
error.no_usable_service: A device was found but could not identify any way to establish a connection to it. If you keep seeing this message, try specifying its IP address or restarting your Apple TV.
error.unknown: Unexpected error! Check log file for further details.
error.auth: Authentication error (you might have entered an invalid PIN code).

abort.device_not_found: Device could not be found on network, please try again.
abort.unrecoverable_error: An unrecoverable error occurred! Check log file for further details.
abort.device_did_not_pair: No attempt to finish pairing process was made from the device.
abort.backoff: Device does not accept pairing reqests at this time (you might have entered an invalid PIN code too many times), try again later.
abort.invalid_config: The configuration for this device is incomplete. Please try adding it again.
abort.auth: Authentication error. You might have entered an invalid PIN code or not have permission to pair via this protocol. Please check access settings on your Apple TV.
abort.already_in_progress: Config flow for device is already in progress.

data.start_off: Do not turn device on when starting Home Assistant
